name: Hydropool LTD
description: Hydropool aggregates private water vendors to provide on-demand water tanker delivery and on-premise metered supply of potable water. Get-Water helps people save money and productive time required to access clean water supply.
one_liner: Hydropool aggregates private water vendors to provide on-demand water tanker delivery and on-premise metered supply of potable water. Get-Water helps people save money and productive time required to access clean water supply.
